name: Sandra Dress-Up
description:
- Dress Up Fashion is a collection of beautiful dressing up made for girls. You can dressup princesses according to your mood. You can choose from nice collection a great number of hairstyles and hair colors.

- Do you love the latest fashions? With this game you can combine various clothes: dresses, shirt, shoes and jewels and create a perfect look.
Start one of the best dress up games of 2016 and Create your own princess and help her to get best look like Cinderella ,barbie or other princesses

- All fashion experts know that hairstyle is very important ! Choose for your princess doll various hairstyles and you can try more colors like blonde hair or brown hair or what you like . Do not forget that she must look very pretty ! After that you have a big closet to choose various and colorful dresses for your princess doll . Blouses and shirts pants and skirts - all kind of clothes are in this closet from our fashion games . Only your fashion games skills and imagination decide what should to wear the princess doll ! Combine the colors and the models of all clothes in one of the biggest dress up games how to dress up, Fashion, hairstyles, haircut, makeup, Wedding DressUp, party DressUp,

- Accessories are also very important in all fashion games : purse and shoes or beautiful jewels will give a brilliant look for your doll . Try to find the perfect combination between the dresses that you choose and these accessories like shoes or necklaces or earrings and see the results : your princess doll looks fabulous !

- Features:
★ share your dress up girls easily over Facebook or E-mail.....
★ Beautiful HD illustrations joined with a rich narrative on every page
★ Help a fashion doll get ready for a trip to the mall.
★ Choose outfits, clothes, shoes and trendy bags.
★ Pick out the perfect dress for her to wear.
★ Complete fashion doll makeovers at your fingertips!
★ Enjoy numerous engaging and fun animations on each page.

- Wanna have more fun? Having problems or suggestions? We would love to hear from you!
